articles.description: Hungarian boxer Anna Luca Hamori says she doesn't "think it's fair" that her next opponent, Imane Khelif, is in the women's category.
articles.title: Imane Khelif competing in women's boxing not fair, says Hungarian opponent

articles.description: Great Britain win Olympic team jumping gold for the first time since London 2012 with a near-faultless performance in Paris.
articles.title: Olympics equestrian: Great Britain win showjumping team gold

articles.description: Bryony Page wins Great Britain's first trampoline Olympic gold to complete her set of a medal of every colour.
articles.title: Bryony Page wins Olympic trampoline gold for GB in Paris

articles.description: Your day-by-day guide to what is happening when - and who to watch out for - at the Paris 2024 Olympics.
articles.title: Olympics schedule & day-by-day guide to key events & British medal hopes at Paris 2024

articles.description: Find out the medal table from the Paris Olympics 2024, including overall medals, gold medals, silver medals and bronze medals for Team GB and other countries.
articles.title: Olympic Medal Table - Paris 2024 gold, silver & bronze tally

articles.description: There's no stopping the Team GB medal train at Paris 2024, as three more are added in the early stages of day seven.
articles.title: Paris Olympics: Peaty, Asher-Smith, Laugher - top five stories from day seven at Games

articles.description: The IOC's decision to allow the entry of two athletes, that are said to have failed gender eligibility tests, has proved controversial.
articles.title: Olympics 2024 boxing controversy: What we know and what we don't know

articles.description: Slovakian swimmer Tamara Potocka is receiving medical treatment after collapsing following her 200m medley heat at La Defense Arena.
articles.title: Olympic swimming: Slovakian Tamara Potocka collapses after race

articles.description: Britain's Oliver Wynne-Griffiths and Tom George are pipped on the line as they miss out on men's pair gold in agonising fashion.
articles.title: Olympic rowing: Great Britain win men's pair silver in dramatic final

articles.description: Fermin Lopez scores twice as Spain defeat Japan 3-0 in Lyon to move into the Olympic men's football semi-finals.
articles.title: Spain beat Japan to set up Olympic semi-final with Morocco
